title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 150.15 - Acknowledgment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 150.15 - Acknowledgment

State Regulations

Each administrative service agency or financial organization
selected to provide services in connection with service award programs shall
contractually agree to discharge its duties as a fiduciary to the participants
in service award programs. In addition, when a financial organization is
selected to perform duties in connection with investment matters, it shall
contractually agree to discharge its duties as fiduciary in accordance with the
prudent expert standard of care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
150.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
